TextView.android:text: A double definition has two definitions of the same answer.
Each half of the clue is a different definition of the word 'bear'.

These clues can be deceptive. They are often quite short - they can be as small as two words. They clues donâ€™t follow the usual 'definition + wordplay' pattern that is seen in most cryptic clues, they are instead 'definition + definition'.
Double definition clues do not usually contain indicator words as they are often just two literal definitions placed side by side.
